items.description: Prioritization and planning in JIRA, sprints, deadlines, estimation and speed control, daily, retro, demo, 1×1 — everything according to product cycle canon
Consistent design system: atoms → molecules → blocks → pages, components, tokens, styles, auto-layouts — everything for scaling, detailed flows with edge cases and failed/empty states
Market and competitive environment analysis, full funnel metrics (North Star Metrics), UX research, JTBD, CJM, usability metrics and hypothesis testing
Pixel-perfect implementation control, scenario testing, bug finding, pixel perfect layout checking
Specifications for design and development, asset preparation, layout handoff, documentation and guidelines
AI for design acceleration, 3D graphics and animations, skill development map
